page.title: 14CANALSIDE FACTORIES SOUTHALL
page.content: Alongside the canal there are many large firms such as Wimpey and Taylor Woodrow who are civil engineers. In a side street off Lady Margaret Road there is a small complex of factories. The oldest building has been there for some 60 years, but the oldest firm has been there only some 40 years, and the youngest only a few weeks before writing this.There is a wide spread of products. These factories have at most some 20 people working there.Most people have been with their firm for about 5 years. The firms manufacture or process microwave components, binding and collating machines, salt, dry ice, salt tablets, water softeners, printing, burglar alarms, stereo record players, plastic mouldings, sheet metal work, cosmetics and oil blending.
